nodes.text: Simol Toc was a male Human merchant who was born on the planet Dellalt, in the Tion Cluster. Toc spent most of his life working on the planet Endregaad and after an outbreak of a deadly viral disease on the world in 19 ABY, Toc organized a caravan of cargo lifters towed by chandos—large, dinosaur-like creatures—to deliver medicinal spice to families living in the Temple Valley region.
